xxl.core.io.converters
Class MeasuredConverter<T>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.converters.Converter<T>
      xxl.core.io.converters.MeasuredConverter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type to be converted.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public abstract class MeasuredConverter<T>
extends Converter<T>

This is a converter which can convert objects with a known maximal size. That is in many cases very useful (for example BlockFileContainer). For example the class xxl.core.indexStructures.BPlusTree uses normaly a BlockFileContainer to store its nodes. I/O operations are executed by composite converters. To determine the node size it is necessary to know the maximal size of the data objects. For this purpose a measured converter is practical.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

MeasuredConverter

Method Detail

getMaxObjectSize

public abstract int getMaxObjectSize()
Determines the maximal size of the objects for which this converter is used. In the case of an integer converter the result will be 4 bytes.

Returns:
the maximal size of the objects for which this converter is used.
